name: Shrimp in Foil
author: barbara
summary: An easy recipe for shrimp in foil for the grill. Shrimp are quickly marinated in olive oil and parsley and then barbecued in a foil pouch.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
1 pinch red pepper flakes, or to taste
1 pound uncooked medium shrimp, peeled and deveined
directions: Combine olive oil, parsley, garlic, salt, black pepper, and red pepper flakes in a bowl
Set aside to marinade for 10 minutes
Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat
Lay out a large piece of aluminum foil and fold in half
Fold up edges to create a pouch in the middle
Place marinated shrimp in the middle and drizzle with lemon juice
Cook on the hot grill until shrimp are pink and cooked through, 8 to 10 minutes
